EmailTemplate.name: Loan Sales Sheet Email to Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Solar Savings Estimate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome New BlueWaver,
We're so happy you are considering solar for your home!
Attached is estimate that outlines BlueWave's Solar Loan product. If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to reach out to us.
View Estimate
Thanks for joining us to make 'Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality.
- All of us here at BlueWave
Our mailing address is: 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
